Title: Requires the New York city housing authority to contract with non-profit private entities when qualifying for certain programs
Summary: Relates to requiring the New York city housing authority to contract with non-profit private entities when qualifying for certain programs; requires the New York city housing authority to contract with a non-profit private entity when converting property to Section 8 units in order to qualify for any program that allows such private entity to renovate, repair, maintain and/or operate such New York city housing authority property.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requiring the New York city housing authority to contract with non-profit private entities when qualifying for certain programs
